participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, always eager to explore new ideas.
participant_1.background: I like to surround myself with people who are passionate about their work and are always looking for new challenges. Since my dog died I am incomplete. I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to. I am in preschool. I spend my day researching the paranormal with my new friend, who is always open to discussing my wild ideas.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and creative, enjoys spending time with friends and family.
participant_2.background: I enjoy celebrating Thanksgiving with my friends in Chicago. I went to the movies with my family and watched a movie about a teacher who inspired her students to be the best they could be. My mother is a librarian. I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days. My cat Sherlock and I love to watch mystery movies together.

content.text: Hello there!
Hello! What's up?
Not much. Just researching the paranormal with my friend.
That sounds fun! What are you researching?
We're trying to figure out if ghosts are real.
That's a cool topic. I've always been interested in the paranormal.
Me too! I think it's fascinating.
What are some of your favorite paranormal stories?
I like the story about the Amityville Horror.
That's a good one. I've seen the movie a few times.
Me too! It's so creepy.
What other paranormal things are you interested in?
I'm also interested in Bigfoot and UFOs.
Bigfoot! I love Bigfoot! I've always wanted to see one.
Me too! I think it would be amazing.
So, what do you think? Do you think ghosts are real?
I'm not sure. I think there's a possibility that they could be real, but I'm not sure if there's enough evidence to prove it.
Yeah, I agree. It's hard to say for sure.
But it's fun to think about!
It sure is!
